roleset.name: engaging in sexual intercourse

example.name: no args, but true to sense
example.text: Maybe he asked her for a fuck, maybe for money but she refused.

example.name: Idiomatic- NOT A LIGHT VERB! Call it .IE
example.text: Clint Eastwood: â€œI don't give a fuck about who wants to get married to anybody else! ..."
example.note: Because the actual meaning of this idiom is 'to care', we do not consider this a light verb. There is a specific sense, give.16, that applies to this. As the usage is idiomatic, it is appropriate to use the .IE tag rather than this 'sexual intercourse' sense.

example.name: NOT EVENTIVE.. .YY!
example.text: It makes me even more pissed off knowing the money I did n't WANT to pay went to these dumb fucks .
example.note: Here, a 'dumb fuck' is a person, not an event.

example.name: Both args. Sorry.
example.text: His fuck of Annabelle Cornfield was to be his last.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on WN noun sense 1. No VNcls.
